summary: A patch to make Hearthfires compatible with Requiem 1.8. Based on Azirok's patch, but does not require it.
descriptionHtml:
This is a temporary patch to make some of the content of the Hearthfires DLC, namely the added Housecarls, fall in line with Requiem v 1.8's changes to the Vanilla housecarls. (special hold-specific armor, added perks, rebalance).

Requirements:
Latest Version of Skyrim
Hearthfires DLC
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem version 1.8[/url]

[u]Install[/u]: Install this mod like you would any other. It's just an esp.

[u]Load Order[/u]: Load this after Requiem, but before any bashed patches, etc.

[u]Update/Uninstall[/u]: This mod doesn't add or modify scripts, so if any other patches come out, feel free to uninstall this one or update with another.

[u]What the mod does[/u]: This mod changes the three Housecarls (Gregor, Rayya, Valdimar) added by the Hearthfires' DLC. It alters their default outfit to a helmetless version of the Hold Steel Plate Armor guards wear in Requiem v1.8, which the housecarls in the 5 major holds also have. It also rebalances their stats to be in line with Requiem 1.8's Housecarl stats, and rebalances them when necessary.

[u][i][b]NOTE:[/b][/i][/u] In keeping with the Requiem style, I decided that for the sake of standardization and since it seemed to be Bethesda's initial intention to make Valdimar a Battlemage; his skill set as well as his starting weapon make him more suitable to the Heavily Armored Battlemage archetype. As such, this will override the Unofficial Hearthfires Patch's changes to his skills. For balance reasons, Valdimar no longer has Mage Armor spells, Heal Self (Rank III), and his Turn Undead got a nerf from Rank II to Rank I. Leave feedback if you think I should change this, though as I stated earlier this patch is merely temporary until azirok releases his. Speaking of which...

[b]Thanks:
[/b]azirok - for making/compiling the Requiem Patches at [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54562/]Requiem - Patch Central
[/url]This patch is built using his patch as a basis. If he would like this updated patch, I will gladly take this page down and send the file over to him for Patch Central. The guy's busy with work; as a modding community we should all help each other out.

ogerboss, xarrian, and Kazekage1 for their work on Requiem. Thanks for making Skyrim less of a hack and slash and more of an actual role-playing game again.

Bethesda, for the Game, DLCs, and modding tools associated with them.

You, the modder, for downloading this patch. :)

[b]History:
v1.01 - [b]Added required perk ranks, I had them set to rank 0 when they should have been Rank 1. Shoutout to tyrthyllanos for catching this![/b]


v1.0[/b] - Initial release.
